message: Just got off the phone with NAG... we have a table at Williamsburg Walks on June 18th. No idea what we'll do yet. Suggestions?
Anyone want to bring a robotics project to show off?
awesome, thats the night of our party too, we should hand out flyers.
Good timing. Anyone want to sign up for a shift to sit at the table and interact with the public, show things off? I'm in for setting up.
I was thinking of sitting in a shift to show Grripz and the process we have to produce them at the lab.
I'm planning on having some supplies for bristlebots for people to assemble. Figure that's a cool no-solder way for someone to get their feet wet.
Looks like it'll be 2pm - 8pm but we can probably knock off early if need be. My parents will be in town so I can't do the whole thing but 2-4 or 2-5 is doable for me.
See if you can find the larger motor and battery, I'll make the huge bristlebot, aka roomba prototype

So, do we need to bring a table, where is our location, any idea if there will be an outlet.  I can do 4-6 no problem, maybe even earlier.  Rob said he was interested in swinging by.  If anyone is going to the robotic meetup at A1 earlier in the day, can anyone see if anyone has robotic eye candy that they could bring.  AJ, I didn't make any progress on the bristlebots, I left the gear by the mindstorm.

It doesn't say specifically http://www.williamsburgwalks.org/faq/, but I imagine we can bring a table and chairs.  I actually found an awesome folding table the other day.  I'll leave it at the lab for us to use.

I asked the folks at NAG and they said they would be providing a table. They said to bring chairs. I'll bring one chair for myself when I set up at 2 and leave that there for whoever follows. They've got a spot for us by North 9th street on Bedford Ave.
So I'll be there 4-6, and I can drag some stuff back home or whatever.
Just a heads up - bring an awning/umbrella or make things easily packable. There's a chance of thunderstorms today around 2pm until the evening.
I am on track to be there for 4pm.  I'll bring a laptop and some charging cables, but the only juice i'll have is laptop battery.  Is anything needed?
Im shutting down the table, im worried it is doing more negative for our image than positive. No reprap, no banner...  whose table are these, do we need to do anything with them.
